content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in harju county court party a plaintiff is requesting the division of joint property and compensation from party b defendant after their divorce party a claims to have contributed financially to the construction of a house on party bs property and wants a fair share of its value party b argues that the property is separate and opposes party as claims the court needs to determine the division of the property and the amount of compensation the court examined the evidence and concluded that party as claim is partially justified the court ordered party b to pay compensation to party a and determined the value of the property the court also awarded party a compensation for the use of the property additionally party a was awarded compensation in a separate case involving joint ownership of a car the court order and judgment were issued by the tallinn district court and harju county court

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
